top_comments_top.body:
Hello and welcome to r/LifeProTips!

Please help us decide if this post is a good fit for the subreddit by up or downvoting this comment. 

If you think that this is great advice to improve your life, please upvote. If you think this doesn't help you in any way, please downvote. If you don't care, leave it for the others to decide.
Never read emails. Go for the world record unread emails in your inbox.
Well I'm older but I learned to use the sort options and subscriptions. I remember when having 2 emails in my inbox was a big deal but I knew in time they'd fill it with trash like my mailbox.
I don’t understand how people can not read so many, there may be something important ! Worth checking the junk folder too

Why waste time moving it and marking it read?

I know when I get to where I left off.  My inbox will delete the oldest emails if room is needed.  I saved anything important in an archive folder.

Maybe I just don't get enough spam.
